scripts.build:site: cd sites/peterszerzo-com && elm-app build && cp build/index.html build/200.html
scripts.build:overeasy: cd sites/overeasy-sh && elm-app build && cp build/index.html build/200.html
scripts.build:maddi: cd sites/annacingi-com && elm-app build && cp build/index.html build/200.html
scripts.deploy:site: npm run build:site && cd sites/peterszerzo-com && surge build peterszerzo.com
scripts.deploy:overeasy: npm run build:overeasy && cd sites/overeasy-sh && surge build overeasy.sh
scripts.deploy:maddi: npm run build:maddi && cd sites/annacingi-com && surge build annacingi.com
